movies.overview: Ring in “CMA Country Christmas” with hosts Lauren Daigle and Jordan Davis this holiday season with a night full of festive classics and one-of-a-kind musical performances. Now in it's 16th year, the 2025 special is filmed in Nashville, Tennessee and airs each holiday season on ABC Television Network.

movies.title: The Golden Girls: 40 Years of Laughter and Friendship
movies.original_title: The Golden Girls: 40 Years of Laughter and Friendship
movies.overview: The special celebrates the 40th anniversary of the beloved sitcom and features interviews with the series creator Susan Harris, executive producer Tony Thomas, original writers, and superfans like Kelly Ripa, Sheryl Lee Ralph, and Mario Lopez. It explores the show's enduring appeal and lasting influence on pop culture.

movies.title: The Wrong Road
movies.overview: A young man driving across state gets lost and finds himself at the house of strangers who know a suspicious amount about him.

movies.title: Pressure Drop
movies.overview: This fall, Teton Gravity Research proudly unveils Pressure Drop, our 30th annual ski and snowboard film.  Pressure Drop captures that fleeting space between calm and chaos — when breath slows, vision sharpens and the mountain demands everything. It’s the moment before gravity takes over.

movies.title: Don't Be Shy
movies.overview: On the verge of a threesome, a wild surprise turns Noah's evening from seductive fantasy to real life nightmare.

movies.title: The Making of Jay Kelly
movies.overview: From the immersive opening shot to the emotional final line, go behind the scenes with director Noah Baumbach, George Clooney, Adam Sandler and more.

movies.title: Jingle Bell Wedding
movies.overview: Jack Cooper and Jessica McFall are planning their New Year’s Eve wedding celebration until a once-in-a-lifetime career opportunity threatens to upend the festivities and matrimonial merriment.

movies.title: Megadoc
movies.overview: Presenting a behind-the-scenes account of a visionary at work. From Oscar-nominated Mike Figgis, Megadoc gives audiences an unfiltered and intimate look at the making of Francis Ford Coppola’s epic sci-fi drama Megalopolis.

movies.title: To Go to the Moon
movies.overview: Margaret is a young woman working at MIT. Amid a time of great innovation in space travel, she's hard at work in the mathematics department, working in the emerging field of software engineering.  She and her colleagues are working on the software for NASA, having worked her way up from her initial application for the once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. Building her team from the ground up, she earns the respect of those she works with, though she's still mistaken for a secretary. But when NASA's Apollo 8 mission goes awry, it's up to her and her team's programming abilities to save the astronauts stranded in space.

movies.title: Masaka Kids, A Rhythm Within
movies.overview: The story behind the Uganda-based YouTube dance sensations who have endured devastating personal loss from famine and war, and use the power of dance and song to overcome hardship.

movies.title: Sidelined: Rewind with Noah and Siena
movies.original_title: Sidelined: Rewind with Noah and Siena
movies.overview: Hang with Noah Beck and Siena Agudong for an extended cut of SIDELINED: THE QB AND ME featuring favorite memories, fun facts, and can't-miss moments.

movies.title: Tidings for the Season
movies.overview: A local newscaster’s life changes when he meets a 10-year-old fan — and his single mother — during the holidays.

movies.title: A Home for Christmas
movies.overview: Set to get married and move to Italy, a chef returns home for one last Christmas. Complications arise when she reunites with an old flame.

movies.title: We're So Dead
movies.overview: The restaurant is dead in more ways than one. A huge party has canceled and dashed their hopes of a big holiday tip. Surviving the shift becomes much more than side work and a deep clean, when a Karen, unhappiness with her service, goes on a spree to murder the entire staff.

movies.title: House of Ashes
movies.overview: Grieving widow Mia must survive psychological and supernatural horrors while under house arrest.

movies.title: Idaho Fallen
movies.overview: When a solitary stranger robs the corrupt family controlling a remote Idaho town, his only guide to escape over the mountains is the family patriarch's headstrong granddaughter.

movies.title: The Great American Baking Show: Celebrity Holiday 2025
movies.original_title: The Great American Baking Show: Celebrity Holiday 2025
movies.overview: Guests are actors Janelle James and Oliver Hudson, along with basketball player Baron Davis and former Saturday Night Live cast member Cheri Oteri.

movies.title: The Christmas Showdown
movies.overview: Former best friends April and Chastity compete for the same event design job at a Christmas show. They must overcome their past falling-out and work together to impress the producer, but rivalry intensifies.

movies.title: Single Blind
movies.overview: In the near future, a man is selected to go through a memory program where his life is forever altered.

movies.title: A Newport Christmas
movies.overview: A charitable and spirited Newport socialite in 1905 finds out her father intends for her to become engaged to a man she’s never met at the upcoming Christmas Eve ball. When she wishes for a different life, a man appears — and she somehow time-travels to 2025.

movies.title: The Christmas Campaign
movies.overview: Sparks fly when an executive and a strategist are paired together to work on a sales pitch. As they battle it out, their personal lives collide with their professional ambitions, and neither expects that the key to success might just be each other.

movies.title: Married to El Chapo: Emma Coronel Speaks
movies.original_title: Married to El Chapo: Emma Coronel Speaks
movies.overview: Swept off her feet by Mexico's most notorious drug lord at just seventeen, Emma Coronel, El Chapo's wife, reflects on her husband's crimes, their tumultuous marriage, and her time in prison, all while grappling with her own accountability.

movies.title: Razors
movies.overview: A man with a razor in his head calls in a maintenance repair.

movies.title: My Mother Looked Just Like You
movies.original_title: My Mother Looked Just Like You
movies.overview: Twenty years ago, Sharon's identical twin vanished. Now, a mysterious young woman enters Sharon's life, claiming to be her sister's daughter and bringing with her a revelation that will upend Sharon's whole life.

movies.title: Jungle Beat 2: The Past
movies.overview: The animals from the African jungle fall through a time portal that the aliens forgot to close behind them. To return to the future, friends will need the help of dinosaurs. But the ancient lizards have their own problems. After all, their world is about to be invaded by cave aliens armed with clubs.

movies.title: Harry Chapin - Cat’s in the Cradle: The Song That Changed Our Lives
movies.original_title: Harry Chapin - Cat’s in the Cradle: The Song That Changed Our Lives
movies.overview: The documentary "Cat's In the Cradle: The Song that Changed Our Lives " explores the legacy of Harry Chapin's iconic song, 50 years after its release. With insights from Billy Joel, Pat Benatar, Dee Snider, Judy Collins, and more, the film reflects on the song's enduring impact and universal themes of fatherhood, time, and the relationships that shape our lives.

movies.title: Lady's Night
movies.overview: Lady has a rough time getting home one night.

movies.title: Luis J. Gomez: You're Making This Worse
movies.original_title: Luis J. Gomez: You're Making This Worse
movies.overview: Luis J. Gomez returns with his third full stand-up comedy special, filmed live at Side Splitters Comedy Club in Tampa, Florida. Known for his raw, edgy, and fearless comedy, Luis brings his unfiltered style to topics like sex, death, parenting, and modern life in this hilarious hour of stand-up.

movies.title: Next to North Pole
movies.overview: A newly divorced mom struggling to heal moves home to North Pole, Alaska, where quirky characters lend support as she rekindles her long- lost pioneer spirit.

movies.title: Frenzy Moon
movies.overview: Six college grad students and a mysterious stranger battle a pack of ferocious werewolves in a secluded cabin.

movies.title: Dimension 20 Live: Battle at the Bowl
movies.original_title: Dimension 20 Live: Battle at the Bowl
movies.overview: The Bad Kids face-off against Chungledown Bim one last time in this canon live show event.

movies.title: Christmas in Mistletoe
movies.overview: A disillusioned Christmas movie location scout rediscovers her Christmas spirit while falling in love with the perfect leading man in the cozy mountain town of Mistletoe.

movies.title: Frankenstein: The Anatomy Lesson
movies.overview: Go deep behind the scenes with visionary filmmaker Guillermo del Toro and the "Frankenstein" cast and crew as they give new life to the classic tale.

movies.title: Something of a Monster
movies.overview: In 1984, a woman with a phantom pregnancy is exiled to a remote Catskills inn where she becomes convinced that she is the target of a mysterious woman in the woods who will stop at nothing to be a mother.

movies.title: Jim Gaffigan: Live from Old Forester — The Bourbon Set
movies.original_title: Jim Gaffigan: Live from Old Forester — The Bourbon Set
movies.overview: Jim Gaffigan presents, Live from Old Forester: The Bourbon Set. Full Show 2025.

movies.title: Rock Paper Scissors
movies.overview: At 2 A.M. on a quiet subway platform, an elderly woman waits alone after missing her train. Her solitude is interrupted when a lively young boy bounds up the stairs and spots a girl on the opposite platform. Without speaking, they start a playful game of rock-paper-scissors, their laughter filling the empty station. But as the girl’s train arrives, their connection is cut short. She waves from the window, and he waves back, smiling. The elderly woman, watching from afar, is reminded that even the briefest encounters can create lasting memories of joy and shared humanity.

movies.title: Oh Yeah!
movies.overview: The story of the iconic electronic music group Yello and the phenomenon of their 1980's hit song, exploring the song’s cultural impact and its enduring place in the American psyche.

movies.title: Against All Odds
movies.overview: Against All Odds is the gripping sequel to Try That Again, following Jason, Jocelyn, and the enigmatic bartender Lexian as they navigate the dangerous consequences of Jason’s repeated manipulations of time. Hunted by Xaldin, a relentless enforcer of the natural order, the trio must outwit their pursuer and confront the ripple effects of their past choices. Every decision carries weight, and survival may demand sacrifices they never imagined. Can they stay one step ahead of destiny itself—against all odds?

movies.title: Manor of Darkness
movies.overview: A group of pretend filmmakers are stuck in a never-ending nightmare at the manor.

movies.title: The Overshadow Parables
movies.overview: Renowned pop singer Nalum Bramlett (Erika Monet Butters), is driven by a malevolent force to find the legendary 'Dagger of Destiny,' an artifact of immense capability-which bestows unlimited power to it's owner.

movies.title: EMOT10N- 10th Anniversary Mini-Doc
movies.overview: Celebrate the 10 year anniversary of the groundbreaking album Emotion by Carly Rae Jepsen

movies.title: A Blood Moon Rising
movies.overview: A young alchemist struggles to resurrect the old west town of Celeb's Folly but in doing so, finds his family now in jeopardy. As tensions build, the Blood Moon Rises, accompanied by the howling of wolves and the promise of bloodshed.

movies.title: Nevermore: The Raven Effect
movies.overview: A deep dive into the mind of Raven — wrestling's tortured genius- Nevermore explores how one man's pain, brilliance, and chaos helped reshape pro wrestling in ECW's brutal, blood-soaked heyday.

movies.title: Yes Repeat No
movies.overview: Three actors audition to play the Palestinian-Jewish actor and activist Juliano Mer-Khamis, a former IDF paratrooper who defiantly identified as “100% Palestinian and 100% Jewish”. During a tense rehearsal meant to determine which of them is most suited to authentically portray Juliano Mer-Khamis, the three Julianos find their sense-of-self fractured and disrupted.

movies.title: Big Leather: Lemon Lanes
movies.overview: With nothing to do in town but watch television and play five-pin bowling, Leo finds himself in his pastime daydreaming and nostalgic for Lemon Lanes, his happy place.

movies.title: Monsters Funday Football
movies.overview: ESPN's Funday Football is back with Monsters, Inc.! Mike and Sulley will duke it out on the Monstropolis cheer floor as part of a real-time Animated Monday Night football Game.

movies.title: Stranger Things: Fireplace
movies.overview: Gather 'round the fireplace in Hawkins, where the flames crackle, the alphabet glows — and the holidays get turned Upside Down.

movies.title: #WorstChristmasEver
movies.overview: A divorced dad reluctantly joins his ex-wife's Christmas celebration in Atlanta for his kids' sake and unexpectedly meets someone who might help him believe in love again.

movies.title: A Town Called Purgatory
movies.overview: In the ashes of the Civil War, two battered gunslingers-one Union, one Confederate, chase a gang into a ghost town with a blood-soaked past. But it ain't just outlaws lurking in Purgatory. Something ancient. Something evil. And it wants revenge. Saddle up, sinner-this ride is going straight to hell.

movies.title: Star Shark Squad
movies.overview: Commander Star Shark, Guppy, and the rest of the Star Shark Squad are locked in a tooth-to-fin battle with Lord Sword, Dr. Dorsal Fin, and their army of goblin sharks bent on devouring the universe! Or at least that's what you would see if legendary producer Richie Dante didn't blow the budget on his pooch Bobby Barko's endless supply of gourmet dog chow. Instead, strap yourself in for a movie that never quite made it to the stars but did manage some of the biggest names in the squared circle!

movies.title: Sitra Achra
movies.overview: A retro video game collector uncovers a prototype cartridge called "Sitra Achra", which disappeared after its creator did in 1985. The collector grows increasingly obsessed with beating Sitra Achra, but the game will not give up its secrets without a fight.

movies.title: The Spirit of Christmas Station
movies.overview: With a Christmas deadline looming, literary editor Isabell retreats to her family's cabin in a quaint town where she spent her holidays as a little girl. Finding the town in a slump, the inspiration she is looking for comes from a local rancher who helps her both revive the annual Christmas Festival and discover the ending to her own story.

movies.title: The Tell-Tale Heart
movies.overview: Modern, surrealist adaptation of Edgar Allan Poe's 'The Tell-Tale Heart' directed by experimental filmmaker Alexander Miller

movies.title: Queens of the Stone Age: Austin City Limits (Live Stream)
movies.original_title: Queens of the Stone Age: Austin City Limits (Live Stream)
movies.overview: Live taping of a performance by Queens of the Stone Age on Tuesday, November 18th at 8 pm for Austin City Limits Live at The Moody Theater.  Queens of the Stone Age—Josh Homme, Troy Van Leeuwen, Michael Shuman, Dean Fertita and Jon Theodore—continue to defy boundaries and expectations. Three decades into a groundbreaking career, the band ventured underground for Alive in the Catacombs, an innovative album-and-film pairing that reimagines their famously heavy catalog in an otherworldly setting. Recorded beneath Paris in centuries-old crypts, the project serves as both séance and statement—summoning everything that has made QOTSA a singular force in modern rock.

movies.title: Paul Anka: His Way
movies.overview: Part road movie and living biography, this documentary traces Paul Anka's seven-decade career through stardom and constant reinvention.

movies.title: Demi Adejuyigbe: Is Going to Do One (1) Backflip
movies.original_title: Demi Adejuyigbe: Is Going to Do One (1) Backflip
movies.overview: Demi Adejuyigbe explores authenticity through original songs, comedic bits, and a single backflip.

movies.title: A Royal Christmas Hope
movies.overview: Julia Carter, the director of a nonprofit called Hope For All, prepares for the busy Christmas season. Despite financial challenges, Julia is determined to keep the holiday spirit alive for families in need. Prince Christopher of St. Monica, seeking a break from royal duties, travels to America for a different Christmas experience. He meets Julia, and, under the guise of a tech executive, volunteers at her nonprofit. As he becomes more involved in her world, an unlikely romance blossoms between Julia and Christopher.

movies.title: Reprieve
movies.overview: A happy couple's quiet evening at home becomes a living nightmare after a visit from some uninvited guests.

movies.title: The White House Effect
movies.overview: Exploring the dramatic origin story of the climate crisis and how a political battle in the George H.W. Bush administration changed the course of history.

movies.title: Hyde
movies.overview: A dark comedy about a prisoner's last meal on death row.

movies.title: Jim vs the Future
movies.overview: A sci-fi multiversal thriller about a man taken hostage by multiple people from different futures, all of whose survival depends on whether or not he breaks up with his fiance.

movies.title: Crumbs Before Christmas
movies.overview: The night before Christmas is usually full of happiness and cheer, but one tiny gingerbread man notices the house is in a bit of disarray, with a handful of holiday tasks that still need to be completed. With Christmas magic in the air, he embarks on a delightful adventure to restore the festive charm before Santa arrives.

movies.title: Christmas of Giving
movies.overview: Belle Carter, dedicated but exhausted head of beloved local nonprofit, Bedford House, has devoted her whole life to making Christmas bright for those in need. But with the holidays just days away, donations are down, time is running out, and Belle feels her efforts are slipping away. When the town’s Mayor announces a new nonprofit consultant, Clara James will be joining Belle to help, Belle fears she’s being replaced in the role that has defined her for years.

movies.title: Nice to See You
movies.overview: A film exploring the horror of the past, the horror of the present, and the horrors of love.

movies.title: Disney's Hulu's Family Guy's Hallmark Channel's Lifetime's Familiar Holiday Movie
movies.original_title: Disney's Hulu's Family Guy's Hallmark Channel's Lifetime's Familiar Holiday Movie
movies.overview: In “Family Guy’s take on generic holiday movies, Lois, who works for “Big Pie” travels to a small town in hopes of stealing Peter’s award-winning family secret pie recipe.

movies.title: Power Slap 17
movies.overview: Blackburn vs. Young

movies.title: An Aspen Christmas Conspiracy
movies.overview: Justin, a brash young lawyer takes a job in Aspen as a Deputy D.A. To make ends meet, he moonlights as a bartender, and shares an apartment with the idealistic Mercedes, a social worker who doubles as a ski instructor on weekends. Sparks fly, but when Justin prosecutes Darla, a widow and favorite social work client of Mercedes, they can kiss their budding romance goodbye. Mercedes takes Justin to task over his strict law-and-order approach, while he simply can't abide her bleeding heart, and hijinks ensue. However, when it appears that Darla is the victim of a much larger conspiracy, Justin and Mercedes must put aside their differences to make sure true justice and mercy are meted out. movies.title: Beyond the Gaze: Jule Campbell's Swimsuit Issue

movies.overview: In the 1960s, Jule Campbell shattered glass ceilings, transforming a struggling sports magazine into a media empire: the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue. The documentary chronicles Jule's 32-year reign, where she championed intelligence and empowered supermodels like Tyra Banks, Christie Brinkley, and Elle Macpherson. Weaving together her journey with feminism's evolution, the film explores the changing gaze on beauty, from objectification to body positivity. Through stunning visuals and intimate interviews with a wise, nonagenarian Campbell, we witness a legacy that continues to inspire.

movies.title: I Skied Down Mount Everest
movies.overview: Ski mountaineer Andrzej Bargiel becomes the first person to climb Mount Everest and ski back to Everest Base Camp without supplementary oxygen. After nearly 16 hours climbing in the high altitude “death zone” (above 8,000m where oxygen levels are dangerously low), Bargiel clipped into his skis on the summit of the tallest mountain on earth and started his descent via the South Col Route. He reached Camp II that night and rested - the summit ridge and Hillary Step had taken longer than planned, meaning darkness made it dangerous and difficult to navigate further that day. The next morning, he skied through the treacherous Khumbu Icefall - guided by a drone flown by his brother, Bartek - before safely arriving at Base Camp to become the first person to ascend and descend Mount Everest on skis with no supplementary oxygen.

movies.title: Chicago Works with Geoffrey Baer
movies.overview: Chicago is known, famously, as “the city that works.” But who keeps it working? In a new 60-minute special, CHICAGO WORKS, Geoffrey Baer meets (and helps) the industrious workers across the city and suburbs who operate the Chicago’s moveable bridges, deliver millions of packages, care for the city’s animals, process recycling, operate the Wrigley Field scoreboard, and more. Along the way, he learns why the 2.6 million residents of “the city of the big shoulders,” as Carl Sandburg described it, are regarded as hard-working, tenacious, and resilient with a well-deserved reputation for Midwestern realness and approachability.

movies.title: Status: Venezuelan
movies.overview: Status: Venezuelan tells the story of one Venezuelan family in Florida trying to stay together — and stay documented — as they navigate the shifting legal immigration landscape under the Trump administration’s policies.

movies.title: 2CRUNK
movies.overview: Two completely opposite best friends, Zoe and Tuesday, have made it to senior year. What should be the greatest night of their high school lives erupts into "so much" soda-fueled chaos, forbidden romance, panicked Ivy League essays, Michelin-star detours, kidnappings, and so… so much more — all with their friendship on the line.

movies.title: The Good Fight
movies.overview: A retired boxer hits rock bottom after a string of DUI's, bar fights, and his family leaves him. Vowing to turn his life around, he leans on his mentor, a charismatic gym owner, a compassionate pastor, and a no-nonsense lawyer. Determined to stop drinking and win his family back, he learns the importance of resilience, stamina and that family, faith, and friends are always worth fighting for.

movies.title: The Mysterious Cinema of Armand St. Pierre
movies.original_title: The Mysterious Cinema of Armand St. Pierre
movies.overview: An independent filmmaker and a film historian discuss ideas about sound and image, documentary, and authorship, while planning a film about a (fictional) early cinema pioneer.

movies.title: The Mimic
movies.overview: Ben, a timid film student, decides to invite his new friends to make a documentary about a local legend. Little does he know that what he discovers while filming will be his worst nightmare.

movies.title: Off The Beaten Path
movies.overview: At Olivet, some students don’t meander past the Dairy Queen near the stoplight..but those who make the trek to the Sims Building are creative minds who are bursting with ideas. Purpose Productions presents a film that leads you through a journey of inspiration, color, and heart. All you have to do is go off the beaten path.

movies.title: Bone Hill
movies.overview: A psychiatrist tries to save a young female patient whose psychoses might hold the key to ending an ancient evil.

movies.title: Three Women and a Possible Fire Next Door
movies.original_title: Three Women and a Possible Fire Next Door
movies.overview: Two roommates (and their friend) must decide whether or not to evacuate their apartment.

movies.title: George Civeris: A Sense of Urgency
movies.original_title: George Civeris: A Sense of Urgency
movies.overview: In this sharp and surreal stand-up special, George Civeris riffs on the child he'll never raise, the Shakespearian nature of straight weddings, and our equine savior. It's hilariously personal, fully absurdist, and oddly poetic.

movies.title: The Touch Was Gone
movies.overview: In a house where not all is well, Josie celebrates her son's first birthday.

movies.title: A Fair Trade
movies.overview: In this black comedy crime epic, eighth grader Tommy Uris is pushed into a teenage drug dealing business run by his two classmates Frank Newton and Patrick Reynolds after walking in on a drug deal between them. As their business falls apart, so does their trust for each other, and they need to either resolve, or kill each other in the process.

movies.title: Gales of November: The Final Voyage of the Edmund Fitzgerald
movies.original_title: Gales of November: The Final Voyage of the Edmund Fitzgerald
movies.overview: The Edmund Fitzgerald, once the largest carrier on the Great Lakes, met its untimely end on a stormy November night in 1975. To commemorate five decades since this maritime disaster, FOX6 delves into the ship's history and legacy, examining the construction of the "Mighty Fitz," the key figures involved, and the night that forever changed the Great Lakes shipping industry.

movies.title: The Pale Pumpkin
movies.overview: A grieving man strolls into a mysterious pumpkin patch.

movies.title: ROH Final Battle 2025 - Zero Hour
movies.overview: Ring of Honor Final Battle Zero Hour Pre Show | 12/5/25 Columbus, Ohio

movies.title: Little Persimmon
movies.overview: A young girl memorializes her late grandfather by attempting to obtain his favorite fruit. Curiously, she receives the aid of a couple of unexpected visitors when she lands herself in hot water.

movies.title: A Propaganda Film by Betar USA
movies.original_title: A Propaganda Film by Betar USA
movies.overview: The Grayzone presents a behind-the-scenes portrait of Betar USA, the militant Zionist street group that claims credit for guiding the Trump administration's jailing and attempted deportation of pro-Palestine student activists.

movies.title: The Broadcast Syndrome
movies.overview: A found footage film made out of old advertisement, made to portray real life dangers in an form of a found broadcast.

movies.title: Cards & Cognac
movies.overview: Four men gather for cards and cognac after the death of a close friend. What begins as a fellowship becomes raw confessions of infidelity, betrayal, guilt, and loss, forcing each man to speak their truth while strengthening their brotherhood.

movies.title: Geese - Getting Killed | From The Basement
movies.original_title: Geese - Getting Killed | From The Basement
movies.overview: A live performance by Geese of their 2025 album Getting Killed.

movies.title: You Can't See It, But It's There
movies.original_title: You Can't See It, But It's There
movies.overview: Two boys sit and discuss ghosts and spirits while unknowingly summoning one.

movies.title: Evil Postal Service Guy
movies.overview: Two friends have their hangout disrupted when a mysterious postal service worker knocks on their door.

movies.title: Ephialtes
movies.overview: An art project from Ben Griffin, based on a recurring nightmare. This short film blends Surrealism, Southern Gothic, Philosophy, and Horror.

movies.title: TETHER
movies.overview: A grieving man spirals into disturbing visions and trauma after his estranged mother's death, culminating in a shocking act.

movies.title: Sleep Hygiene: The Movie
movies.overview: A man practices good sleeping habits.

movies.title: Stuck in the Desert
movies.overview: A cinematic high-octane music video by the Gravities. When a bank robbery gets botched, The Gravities have no choice but to destroy the money, or risk being killed.

movies.title: Zoltan Kaszas: London Fog
movies.overview: In his new stand-up special London Fog, comedian Zoltan Kaszas wrestles with anxiety, explores the many modern paths to parenthood, and reflects on growing up with a single immigrant mother—all while trying not to let success change him.

movies.title: Salute to Service 2025: A Veterans Day Celebration
movies.original_title: Salute to Service 2025: A Veterans Day Celebration
movies.overview: Country music legend Trace Adkins joins the U.S. Army Field Band to host "Salute to Service 2025: A Veterans Day Celebration." Featuring unforgettable performances by opera superstar Angel Blue, jazz vocalist Kurt Elling, and Trace Adkins himself.

movies.title: Impasse
movies.overview: The fabric of a long relationship begins to tear after buried resentments come to surface.

movies.title: Creator
movies.overview: God creates the universe out of nothingness— but when she creates mankind to enjoy her work, she gets a little carried away with seeing things from their point of view. As her indulgence grows, the beautiful world she once loved above all else is overwhelmed.

movies.title: Ian Lara: Material Boy
movies.overview: Ian Lara unveils his new special in New York City.

movies.title: The Last Free Man on Earth
movies.original_title: The Last Free Man on Earth
movies.overview: In pursuit of enlightenment, a platinum selling record producer left his hedonistic life behind to live in a cave. Nine years later he continues to grapple with the question, what does it mean to be free?

movies.title: Leo from Chicago
movies.overview: The Vatican media documentary about the roots of Robert Francis Prevost in his native United States. It follows an itinerary that begins with his childhood in Dolton, through the memories of his brothers Louis and John, and continues among schools and universities, communities and parishes, featuring the voices of confreres, teachers, classmates, and longtime friends.  A production of the Vatican Dicastery for Communication, in collaboration with the Archdiocese of Chicago and the Apostolate El Sembrador Nueva Evangelización (ESNE), broadcast on the official channels of Vatican Radio – Vatican News.

movies.title: Take A Friend
movies.overview: It's the last night before college graduation, and Logan is determined to record it all. But as more chaos starts to descend, will he keep recording or learn to live in the moment?

movies.title: A Heist Away From Home
movies.overview: After a deliveryman collides with a multi-millionaire, he enlists his best friend's help to execute a once-in-a-lifetime heist.

movies.title: Food Baby
movies.overview: After one bite too many, a gluttonous foodie’s late-night binge spirals into terror when his growing stomach takes on a mind of its own.

movies.title: Nemesis
movies.overview: A man recounts to his therapist four instances of being stalked by a masked killer who hasn't been seen in ten years.

movies.title: Golden Boys
movies.overview: Inside a frat house, holds many types of boys who want to prove their worth, in the middle of it all stands Cooper, Owen, and Austin.

movies.title: Mega Trump
movies.overview: In 2025, America's wilder and crazier than ever. It will take an epic leader to get society back on track - enter Donald J. Trump (Timothy Banfield). Facing threats from the Deep State, alien invaders, the Megalodon, and the vengeful ghost of Adolf Hitler himself - reincarnated in the guise of a revolution-stoking porcelain doll - the POTUS has really got his hands full. Along with his right-hand robot, the Xterminator (Edson Camacho), Trump meets all the troublemakers head-on, in this follow-up to the wildly polarizing Trump vs. the Illuminati. With the unique brand of pomp and panache everyone's come to expect, things are gonna be tremendous.

movies.title: Coming Out Polyamorous for Thanksgiving
movies.overview: For the first time since coming out as polyamorous, spouses Alex and Don are hosting Don’s Southern parents for Thanksgiving in their New York City apartment. The fifth seat at the table is for Aly, Don’s partner of three years. Aly and Alex have developed a deep metamour connection, and introducing Aly to Don’s parents is an important step for integrating the lives of all three. But tensions escalate when Don’s parents struggle to understand the relationship dynamics between their son and his partners, and the polycule must weigh biological family against their chosen one.

movies.title: The Obsessive Shadow
movies.overview: Based on the survival indie horror game, The Obsessive Shadow delivers a tense, atmospheric story of a mother and her next-door neighbor fighting to save her son after a chilling message on tv warns of something sinister lurking in the dark.

movies.title: Courier MOTS: Applesauce and PIER Pressure
movies.original_title: Courier MOTS: Applesauce and PIER Pressure
movies.overview: 2 years after former staff writer Nick Karmia ended the MOTS series (Man on the Street) with a SPLASH at the College of DuPage’s (COD) Annual Boat Race, the Courier finally brings back the beloved series. With an invitation by COD’s Engineering and Technology Club to cover the same event years later, what better way than with a fun hat and 48 fl oz of applesauce? Little did anyone know the absolute insanity that would inevitably unfold on this very day…

movies.title: Elmira High School Library Tour
movies.overview: Mason Crawford & Quinn Sullivan interview multiple people to ask questions about the Elmira library.

movies.title: Light Trespassing
movies.overview: Riley and Barry get in serious trouble when they decide to "check out" an abandoned house.

movies.title: Don't Come Looking
movies.overview: When a group of friends vanish during a weekend trip after ignoring a dire warning, the search reveals that some secrets are best left buried.

movies.title: UFC Fight Night 263: Garcia vs. Onama
movies.original_title: UFC Fight Night 263: Garcia vs. Onama
movies.overview: UFC Fight Night 263: Garcia vs. Onama was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on November 1, 2025, at the UFC Apex in Enterprise, Nevada, part of the Las Vegas Valley, United States. A featherweight bout between Steve Garcia and David Onama headlined the event.

movies.title: One Bite
movies.overview: Two mysterious individuals indulge in a lucid conversation while trying a new snack.

movies.title: Pollo Guisado
movies.overview: In a small kitchen rich with memory, Lucia teaches her daughter Mariana how to make pollo guisado, a cherished family recipe passed down from generations upon generations. As they cook, Lucia shares stories of her childhood, weaving together food, family, and culture in every simmering pot.  What begins as a lesson in cooking becomes something much deeper—a quiet ritual of connection, memory, and love. As time passes, Mariana finds herself returning to the recipe, now carrying the weight of legacy in her own hands.

movies.title: Date Night
movies.overview: Cassey and Jesse take a romantic stroll down Main Street. Their little date night is going well... until it takes a turn.

movies.title: Milestone No. 3
movies.overview: Milestone No. 3 is a documentary following three lifelong friends as they travel across the country to California for the very first time. Armed with doubts and anxiety about continuing his filmmaking career, director Nicholas Dapolito enlists the help of friends and family to examine why he creates, and if this path is truly right for him.

movies.title: Sex Hysteria: The End
movies.overview: A true story of love and consequence. The album film. In my own life I’ve notice a strong theme of learned love, and confusing pain for comfort. Often being stuck in a cycle of my own making. This film is a visual representation about realizing that healing isn’t a fix you find, it’s a shift in perspective. I wanted to honor the moments that shaped me and the fans who walk through similar shadows. The immense amount of courage it takes to jump, to break the pattern, to choose something better, and to understand that the jump is the only way anything ever changes.

movies.title: Adam & Steve: Escape From MAGA
movies.overview: Set in a dystopic America, married couple Adam & Steve run from Project 2025 and battle crazy Christian Nationalists, only to realize that their gay love might just save mankind's soul.

movies.title: do you ever yearn?
movies.overview: happens to the best of us

movies.title: EMERSION
movies.overview: A competitive surfer makes a compelling discovery when he is dragged under the waves...

movies.title: (Klora, Minky)
movies.overview: Klora and Minky work together to solve a very.. very.. very important equation.

movies.title: The Cosmic Clown
movies.overview: Depressed divorcee Tim is guided to the ultimate, beautiful oneness of the universe by a freak from the Moon.

movies.title: A Winnie-the-Pooh Christmas
